programme.title: Sunny Side Up
programme.desc: Chandra is down in the dumps and Chan gets the neighbours and friends' help to cheer him up. Iskandar is annoyed at Ibrahim's persistent 'fathering'. Melvin finds a way to get Nelly and Olivia to get along. But will this 'peace accord' last?

programme.title: Talking Point
programme.desc: (Encore) From Coldplay to Taylor Swift, getting a concert ticket has become so hard. What's the best way to get one? Shrey Bhargava puts it to the test and reveals who're behind those crazy queue numbers.

programme.title: Weather Gone Viral S5
programme.desc: The episodes cover the most extreme weather action caught on camera. We learn from survivors who have beaten the odds to overcome the most treacherous weather conditions imaginable. The series also shows how for on-air meteorologists, being on the front lines of Mother Nature is never easy and sometimes the reporter covering the story becomes the story.

programme.title: America's Got Talent: Extreme
programme.desc: America's Got Talent: Extreme is an American reality television and talent competition series created by Simon Cowell. The series is a spinoff of America's Got Talent that focuses on stunt performers. Showcasing the most outrageous, unique and jaw-dropping acts of enormous scale and magnitude that simply can't be confined to a theater stage.

programme.title: Wok Vs Pot
programme.desc: Have you ever wanted to create silky Italian pasta or soft and spongy rice noodles?
